title: I Am Not A Fan Of Anything Or Anyone: A Polemic (Fans, Fandoms, Fanatics)
description:
I have on occasion been asked if I am a fan of ___________ . This is my answer to that question. 
...........
Your help is needed now more than ever  PLEASE SUPPORT THIS CHANNEL TODAY! Please consider a monthly contribution through PayPal to receive extra content and to help me afloat here in Georgia. And if you start today you can get 10 hours worth of extra content immediately. ($10 per month or more  OR $50 plus in one gift.)
Click this... 
https://www.paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=GE5NHN8AYL3YC

Watch this video for more about receiving extra content: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nykTp3TziRY
................
The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas:  https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ Visit my Gravity From Above channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 

The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts. 
https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 

And to understand more about my life in Georgia 
check out my Georgian Crossroads channel: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeFJ6Tm71ieNcjcUb-Trc8g

And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. 
https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 
Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. 
From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Swimming Against the Stream

Byrne

#fanaticism #fandoms #fans
